fr.upmc.datacenter.software.interfaces

Interface RequestSubmissionHandlerI

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ApplicationVM

    public interface RequestSubmissionHandlerI
    The interface RequestSubmissionHandlerI defines the component internal services to receive and execute requests.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant              true

    Created on : May 4, 2015

    Version:
    $Name$ -- $Revision$ -- $Date$
    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

      void acceptRequestSubmission(RequestI r)

      accept the request r, execute it and notify its termination.
